name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-graph-meeting-notification-csharp
title: Online meeting subscription
shortDescription: This sample application demonstrates how to use an online meeting subscription to send notifications in Microsoft Teams chat when users join, leave, or when meetings start and end.
longDescription: This sample application showcases the integration of online meeting subscriptions in Microsoft Teams, providing notifications in chat for events such as user join/leave and meeting start/end. Built with C#, it features bot interactions, adaptive cards, and utilizes Microsoft Graph API for seamless notifications.
